snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s book will not be a memoir, aides said, but a reflection on his tenure in the job and his approach to governing.
abstract: Gov Andrew M Cuomo will write a book that will compete with two biographies of him now in the works; spokesman says Cuomo's book, to be published in 2014, will not be a memoir but a reflection on his experiences as New York State governor and a look at long-term issues and challenges to be addressed in the state.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s book will not be a memoir, aides said, but a reflection on his tenure in the job and his approach to governing.

headline.main: Another Cuomo Book, This Time by Him
headline.print_headline: Another Cuomo Book, This Time by Him
